item.description:
Anyone interested in a quick hike- probably 2.5 miles round trip to the top and back easy hike. Start at the Visitors Center and hike to the top and back. Bicentennial Trail to Loop Trail to top and back. Its really a nice easy gradual ascent, not too difficult at all. It takes me 1.5 up and back with no "lingering" at the top.

Â 

Look for the girl in the Dark Blue VW Beetle :-)

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Hike Mt Wachusett from Visitors Center
